data.title: Indiana Jones Games
data.meta_description: Indiana Jones is the archeologist who appears in the films of the same name.  The films came from the minds of George Lucas and Steven Spielberg, starring Harrison Ford as Jones.
data.text:
Indiana Jones and the Great Circle

December 9, 2024

PC

PS5

XSX

Indiana Jones and the Great Circle follows the titular character on his journey to discover the mysterious "Great Circle" and stop the villainous forces trying to exploit its power in a globetrotting action-adventure game from the makers of Wolfenstein.

LEGO Indiana Jones 2: The Adventure Continues

November 17, 2009

MAC

PSP

+ 6 more

X360

PS3

Wii

DS

XBGS

PC

Lego Indiana Jones 2 retells the stories from the original trilogy in new levels, as well as the story of Kingdom of the Crystal Skull. It will also have a level editor.

Indiana Jones and the Staff of Kings

June 9, 2009

PSP

PS2

+ 2 more

Wii

DS

Set in 1939, follow Indiana Jones as he searches all around the globe for the Staff of Moses.

Indiana Jones and the Infernal Machine

November 23, 1999

N64

GBC

PC

In this Action/Adventure/Platformer, Indy looks to find the pieces of the infernal machine before the Russians can rebuild it in their attempts to communicate with the Babylonian god, Marduk. Originally developed for the PC, the game was later ported to the N64 and the Game Boy Color.

Indiana Jones and His Desktop Adventures

April 30, 1996

MAC

PC

Indiana Jones and His Desktop Adventures is a overhead 2D-action adventure game released on the PC and Macintosh by Lucas Arts in 1996. Arguably it's most notable feature is that the plot, map size, and item locations are randomly generated at the beginning of the game.

Indiana Jones' Greatest Adventures

October 1994

SNES

WSHP

A Super Nintendo game that recreates the classic Indiana Jones film trilogy. Players follow Indiana's steps from Raiders of the Lost Ark up until The Last Crusade in this platformer using Indy's famous whip as well as various guns and grenades.

Instruments of Chaos Starring Young Indiana Jones

June 1, 1994

GEN

Instruments of Chaos Starring Young Indiana Jones is an action/adventure game with platforming elements. In it you control the titular character through missions around the world.

Indiana Jones and The Fate of Atlantis: The Action Game

1992

AMI

CPC

+ 4 more

AST

C64

SPEC

PC

An isometric-perspective Indiana Jones action-adventure game that features a similar story to the more successful Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis point-and-click adventure game.

Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis

June 1992

AMI

MAC

+ 3 more

Wii

PC

FMT

Indiana Jones follows an ancient medallion around the world to discover the secret of Atlantis before the Nazis can wield its terrible power in this classic LucasArts point-and-click adventure.

Indiana Jones and The Last Crusade: The Graphic Adventure

July 8, 1989

AMI

AST

+ 4 more

MAC

PC

FMT

CDTV

Indiana Jones and The Last Crusade: The Graphic Adventure was developed by LucasArts and is a recreation of the third Indiana Jones film in adventure game form.

Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade: The Action Game

November 1992

AMI

GB

+ 9 more

GG

GEN

SMS

AST

C64

MSX

SPEC

NES

PC

An action game based on the movie of the same name. Indiana Jones and his father, Dr. Henry Jones Sr., must find the Holy Grail before the Nazis get to it.
